oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Daguerreotype of Lavinia Hilliard Shute
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Daguerreotype of Lavinia Hilliard Shute (1837-1872), grandmother of Margaret and Elise Croft. Inscription on back of photograph (covered by case) reads, "Presented to me on the 12th(?) day of July 1853 by my Cousin Lavinia L. Hilliard."

Lavinia Lafayette Hilliard (1837-1872) married William Dickson Shute (1834-1916) in 1856. William's father, Lee Shute, sold the Grassmere property to his son for $5 in 1859 on occasion of his marriage to Lavinia. The Shutes had nine children together, but only four of them survived to adulthood: Margaret Shute, Leila Shute Tigert, Kate Shute Croft, and Lavinia Shute Hotchkiss.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Women--Tennessee;
